shared.model.map.handlers

Class PortHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.handlers.PortHandler

  • public class PortHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles information regarding ports.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

    • Method Detail

      • AddPort

        public void AddPort(PortType type,
                    Edge edge,
                    Hex hex)
             throws MapException
        Adds a port to a hex. The hex must be a water tile.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of port being added.
        edge - The edge the port is on.
        hex - The hex the port is on.
        Throws:
        MapException - Don't add ports to dry land unless you wan't this exception.

      • ContainsPort

        public boolean ContainsPort(Coordinate vertex)
        Determines if there is a port at the requested vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertex - The vertex coordinate.
        Returns:
        True if yes, else false.

      • GetPort

        public PortType GetPort(Coordinate vertex)
                 throws MapException
        Gets the port at the specified vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertex - The desired vertex.
        Returns:
        The port type of the vertex.
        Throws:
        MapException - Thrown if there isn't a port at the vertex.

      • GetPorts

        public java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<Edge,Hex>> GetPorts()
        Gets all the available ports.
        Returns:
        An iterator to the ports.
